name: Frank & Stein
description:
Frank & Stein

Two abject humanoids discover they are linked with an organ and try to escape a laboratory full of traps and dangers. Frank is a binary and brutal being that seems obsessed by murder, while Stein is a kind-of-okay smart humanoid. Together, they'll discover that freedom takes many forms...

Winner of LD34 compo, Frank & Stein was made based on a double theme : "two buttons only" and "growing". 

http://cartoonist-discounts-30146.bitballoon.com/
